sentences.sContent: The Bolsheviks expropriated the property of the landowners.
sentences.sCn: 布尔什维克征收了地主的土地。

remMethod.val: ex(出) + propr(固有的) + iate → 使人失去自身所固有的 → 征用， 没收(私有财产)

trans.tranOther: if a government or someone in authority expropriates your private property, they take it away for public use
